items.title: Three-front war, one new lever
items.text: AI raised expectations, collapsed channels, and attacked value props, so trust became the new playbook.

items.title: Trust-based acquisition replaces broken channels
items.text: SEO, SEM, and corporate social weakened, while people-led sharing and community drove word of mouth.

items.title: Trust-based retention becomes the moat
items.text: As AI commoditized utility, customers stayed with products that kept earning trust over time.
